description: Clear, direct hints for collocation meanings

する.運動: to do exercise; to work out
する.練習: to practice; to do practice or training
する.準備: to make preparations; to prepare; to get ready
する.連絡: to contact someone; to get in touch
する.紹介: to introduce someone or something; to make an introduction
する.研究: to conduct research or study something
する.計画: to make a plan; to plan something
する.試合: to play/compete in a match or game
する.失敗: to make a mistake or fail
する.相談: to consult someone; to ask for advice
する.用意: to make preparations; to get ready
する.予約: to make a reservation or booking
する.挨拶: to greet someone; to give a greeting
する.注意: to pay attention; to be careful; to give a warning
する.心配: to worry; to be concerned or anxious
する.安心: to feel relieved or at ease
する.利用: to use or make use of something
する.放送: to broadcast; to air a program
する.案内: to guide or show someone around
する.邪魔: to interfere with or obstruct someone/something
する.出発: to depart; to set out on a journey
する.入学: to enter/enroll in a school or university
する.入院: to be hospitalized; to enter the hospital
する.出席: to attend (a meeting, class, or event)
する.競争: to compete; to engage in competition
する.喧嘩: to have a fight/quarrel with someone
する.反対: to oppose; to object; to be against something
する.遠慮: to hold back; to refrain; to be modest
する.世話: to take care of someone; to look after someone
する.復習: to review or revise learned material
する.予習: to prepare for a lesson or class
する.失礼: to be rude or impolite; to commit a discourtesy
する.承知: to acknowledge; to consent; to understand and agree
する.柔道: to do judo; to practice judo
する.支度: to make preparations; to get ready
する.退院: to be discharged from the hospital
する.見物: to go sightseeing; to watch or view something
する.寝坊: to oversleep; to sleep in late
する.下宿: to live in a boarding house/lodgings
する.お祝い: to celebrate; to hold a celebration
する.故障: to break down; to malfunction; to have a failure
する.ご馳走: to treat someone to a feast/meal
する.代わり: to substitute for someone; to do something in place of another
する.格好: to strike a pose; to assume a posture
する.拝見: to humbly look at or see something (honorific)

いる.人: to be present (of a person); to have someone present
いる.家: to be at home; to stay home
いる.中: to be in the middle of (doing something)
いる.会社: to work at/be employed by a company
いる.国: to be in a country; to stay in a country
いる.母: to have a mother; one's mother exists/is present
いる.父: to have a father; one's father exists/is present
いる.男: to be a man; for a man to exist/be present
いる.女: to have a woman/girlfriend; to be with a woman
いる.女の子: to have a daughter; to have a girl (present)
いる.運転手: to have a driver; to employ a chauffeur
いる.社長: to have a company president; president exists/is present
いる.高校生: to be a high school student
いる.市民: to be a citizen; to exist as citizens
いる.パパ: to have a dad; for one's dad to be present
いる.奥さん: to have a wife; to be married (of a man)
いる.校長: to be a principal; to have a principal present
いる.看護婦: to have a nurse present; to be attended by a nurse
いる.公務員: to be a government worker/civil servant
いる.留学生: to have/host exchange students (at a school/institution)
いる.警官: to have a police officer present; for a police officer to be there
いる.赤ん坊: to have a baby; to be expecting
いる.家内: to have a wife; to be married (with a wife)
いる.おまわりさん: to have a police officer present/nearby
いる.すり: to be a pickpocket; to work as a pickpocket
いる.アナウンサー: to be an announcer/work as a broadcaster
いる.小鳥: to have a small bird; to keep a little bird
いる.一人: to be alone; to be by oneself
いる.二人: to be two people; to be a couple

ある.こと: to have happened; to have experienced something
ある.問題: to have a problem; for a problem to exist
ある.場所: to be at/in a place; to have a location
ある.店: to have/run a store or restaurant
ある.公園: to have a park (in an area/location)
ある.駅: to have a station (nearby); for a station to exist
ある.楽しみ: to have something to look forward to
ある.つもり: to intend to do something; to plan to
ある.場合: when there is a case/situation; if there is
ある.帰り: to be on one's way back/returning
ある.仕方: to have no choice; to be unavoidable
ある.専門: to have a specialty/area of expertise
ある.クラス: to have class; to attend class
ある.後: to exist afterward; to remain later
ある.間: to have an interval/gap between things
ある.ころ: to be around a certain time; when something existed
ある.この頃: to exist/happen these days; to be present recently
ある.この間: to happen/occur the other day or recently
ある.途中: to be in the middle of something; to be halfway through
ある.晩: to happen one evening; to be a certain evening
ある.夕方: to be/exist in the evening; to have an evening
ある.毎年: to happen every year; to occur annually
ある.一昨日: to be/exist the day before yesterday
ある.一昨年: to exist/happen the year before last
ある.夕べ: to be/exist in the evening; to happen last night
ある.正月: to have/celebrate New Year (first three days)
ある.再来年: to be/exist/happen in the year after next
ある.再来週: to have something the week after next
ある.再来月: to be/exist/happen the month after next
ある.上: to be above/on top of something
ある.内: to be within/inside (a period or range)
ある.外: to be outside; to exist externally
ある.側: to be on someone's side; to exist as a side/aspect
ある.横: to be lying down sideways; to lie on one's side
ある.裏: to have a hidden side or ulterior motive
ある.表: to be on the surface; to appear outwardly
ある.通り: to be as expected; to go as planned
ある.そば: to be near/close to someone; to stay by someone's side
ある.向こう: to be on the other/opposite side
ある.出口: to have an exit; for an exit to exist
ある.入口: to have an entrance; for an entrance to exist
ある.海岸: to be located on/near the coast
ある.屋上: to have a rooftop; for a rooftop to exist
ある.郊外: to be located in the suburbs
ある.玄関: to have an entrance; for an entrance to exist
ある.門: to have a gate; to have connections/influence
ある.受付: to have a reception desk; reception desk exists
ある.交番: to have a police box (in the area)
ある.売り場: to have a sales counter/department (in a store)
ある.隅: to be in every corner; to be everywhere
ある.区: to be located in a ward/district
ある.田舎: to be in the countryside; to live in a rural area
ある.林: to have/be a forest or woods
ある.暇: to have free time or be free
ある.半分: to be half; to exist as half
ある.湖: to have a lake (lake exists/is present)
ある.匂い: to have a smell/odor; to smell (of something)
ある.お祭り: to have a festival; for a festival to be held
ある.留守: to be away from home; to be out
ある.特急: to have/run a limited express train
ある.畳: to have tatami mats (in a room)
ある.棚: to be on a shelf; to be shelved
ある.ポケット: to have something in one's pocket
ある.曇り: to have cloudy weather; to be cloudy
ある.式: to have/contain an equation or formula
ある.以上: to be more than; to exceed (a certain amount)
ある.以下: to be below/under a certain amount or level
ある.以外: to be other than; to exist except for
ある.以内: to be within/fall within a certain range or limit
ある.日曜日: to be a Sunday; when it's Sunday
ある.わけ: to have a reason; there is a reason
ある.うち: to be at home; while at home
ある.別: to make a distinction; to differentiate
ある.代わり: to have/be a substitute or replacement
ある.おかげ: to be thanks to; to owe to someone's help
ある.一杯: to have all one can handle; to be full of
ある.久しぶり: to be/happen for the first time in a long while
ある.両方: to have both; for both to exist
ある.終わり: to have an end; to come to an end
ある.ご馳走: to have a feast; to be treated to a meal
ある.一つ: to have one thing; there is one
ある.二つ: to have two (of something); to be two
ある.台: to have a stand/platform/table (to be available)
ある.番: to have one's turn; to be one's turn
ある.テーブル: to have a table (furniture exists/is present)
ある.カーテン: to have curtains; for curtains to be present
ある.戸: to have a door; for there to be a door
ある.レジ: to be at the cash register
ある.けが: to have an injury; to be injured
ある.０: to have zero; to be nothing/none
ある.零: to have zero; to be nothing/nonexistent
ある.メートル: to be/measure a certain number of meters
ある.グラム: to weigh a certain number of grams

なる.大人: to become an adult; to grow up
なる.最後: to reach the end; to come to a conclusion
なる.最初: to be the first; to become the beginning
なる.始め: to become the beginning; to mark the start
なる.公務員: to become a civil servant/government employee
なる.留学生: to become an exchange student/international student

できる.こと: to be able to do something; to be possible

できる.仕事: to be capable of doing one's job/work
できる.運転: to be able to operate/drive (a machine/vehicle)

思う.こと: to think about something; to have thoughts/feelings about something

言う.こと: to say something; to make a statement

言う.三: to count to three; to say "three

くれる.お土産: to give someone a souvenir/gift from a trip

やる.スポーツ: to play sports or do sports

しまう.こと: to finish doing something; to end up doing something

違う.意見: to have a different opinion; to disagree

違う.文化: to have a different culture; to differ culturally

わかる.問題: to understand/grasp a problem or question
わかる.話: to understand what someone is saying/talking about

出る.家: to leave the house; to go out

来る.今: to arrive at the present moment; to reach now
来る.後: to come after; to follow later

来る.夕方: evening comes; evening approaches; dusk arrives

死ぬ.人: to die (referring to a person dying)

つける.冷房: to turn on the air conditioning

知る.人: to know a person; to be acquainted with someone

知る.方: to know how (to do something); to know the way

知る.地理: to know geography; to be familiar with geography

始まる.試合: to begin/start a match or game
